reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product
reviews.author: Andrea Robinson
reviews.content: The Smart Watch for Men and Women offers an impressive array of features designed to cater to a variety of needs. With its 1.96" HD display, the smartwatch delivers sharp and vibrant visuals, making it easy to interact with its interface and read notifications. The ability to answer and make calls directly from the watch is a convenient feature, ensuring that you can stay connected without having to reach for your phone.In terms of health and fitness, this smartwatch excels with its comprehensive monitoring capabilities. It tracks heart rate, sleep patterns, and steps, providing valuable insights into your well-being. The 113+ sports modes are a standout feature, catering to a wide range of activities from running to yoga, ensuring that the watch can adapt to various workout routines.The IP68 waterproof rating adds a layer of durability, allowing you to wear the watch while swimming or during intense workouts without worrying about water damage. Compatibility with both Android and iOS devices ensures that the watch can integrate seamlessly into most users' lifestyles.The pink color adds a stylish touch, making it a versatile accessory that can complement different outfits. Overall, this smartwatch combines functionality with style, making it a solid choice for anyone seeking a feature-rich, reliable, and aesthetically pleasing wearable.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect smartwatch for school!
reviews.author: Irina Kh
reviews.content: I ordered this smartwatch for my child to use in school, and it has exceeded my expectations! Pairing with phone was easy, and the connection is stable. The screen design is perfect for her to easily and quickly see the information. Today after first day at school, my child was incredibly pleased with it. Since phones aren’t allowed out during school hours, this watch has been a fantastic way for her to stay connected. She can easily check my messages, which is a great comfort for both of us. The ability to view messages and check the time without needing to pull out a phone has made her feel secure and connected throughout the day. The watch is not only practical but also comfortable to wear. It’s lightweight and durable, which suits her active school day perfectly. The various features, including fitness tracking, are an added bonus that she enjoys!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 15, 2024

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work
reviews.author: Matt Wilcox
reviews.content: I liked the look and feel of it, and the battery life is great. I was able to easily set it up on the app, however, I noticed many times it just not logging things. It said I didn't sleep at all when I had been sleeping for hours, the step tracker doesn't log all steps amd freezes at certain intervals, and the pulse and calorie estimates don't always work. Pulse was reading about half of what it actually was during workouts, it pauses randomly during workouts, and when set to strength training, it only logged 75 calories in an intense one-hour workout. I'm returning. Very disappointing.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 4, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent smartwatch
reviews.author: Vanessa Botia
reviews.content: I've been using this smartwatch for a few weeks now, and I’m thoroughly impressed.i like it because:-The design is comfortable to wear all day.- The display is bright, responsive, and easy to read, even in direct sunlight.-The battery life is good-Syncing with my phone was quick and seamless, and the app provides a ton of customization options for watch faces and notifications.Overall, this smartwatch offers great value for the price.Highly recommended for anyone looking for a reliable and versatile smartwatch!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 18, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Feature-Packed Smart Watch—A Must-Have for Everyone!
reviews.author: Todd Faubel
reviews.content: I’m thrilled with my new Smart Watch! It’s sleek, stylish, and packed with features. The display is clear and easy to navigate, and it tracks my fitness goals accurately. The battery life is impressive, lasting several days on a single charge. It’s also comfortable to wear all day. Whether you’re checking notifications or monitoring your health, this smart watch does it all effortlessly. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a versatile and reliable smartwatch
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2024

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Issues with app
reviews.author: Ne
reviews.content: Cons: Frequently disconnects from the app, so certain features like sms only work intermittently. In app, I changed units to pounds and the metric system, but it continues to show units in the british system and weigh in kg. There's no option for a vibrate only alarm clock (without sound). Pros: cost, size, style, water repellent, calling capabilities, charges quickly and holds a charge for 2-3 days with moderate use. Sleep, HR, and Oxygen readers seem to be pretty accurate
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Health Options
reviews.author: Susie
reviews.content: Health Tracking: this smartwatch has features like heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and activity tracking, helping users manage their fitness and health. It also allows you to receive notifications for calls, texts, and apps directly on your wrist, making it easier to stay connected without constantly checking your phone. Long Battery Life also it offer impressive battery life, often lasting several days on a single charge.Overall the black colour is very cute.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 8, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a decent smartwatch for the price.(FYI No blood pressure monitoring)
reviews.author: Sgt. Slab Wrankle
reviews.content: Got it hoping to better monitor my health as well as answer calls & receive texts while my phone is on the charger. O2 & heart rate seemed to work fine but it was missing a big important health monitoring feature most of all smart watches should have which is blood pressure monitoring it has everything(heart rate, sleep & O2) except blood pressure which I was kind of hoping it would have or at least be able to add. Otherwise good display, connecting to phone was a little wonky but does work eventually through their app. Will be returning for a similar smartwatch that has blood pressure monitoring.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart watch
reviews.author: irina pokharel
reviews.content: I got this watch for my mom. She loved it so much because it’s sleek design. She said now she can even answer her phone through watch while working. So it made her life easy. This watch can also track physical activity, heart rate, sleep pattern. If you want to have fashionable watch with in affordable range then you should definitely buy this one . This will be great option as gift too
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2024

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very accurate
reviews.author: Kazoua thao
reviews.content: Just received this yesterday, testing it out and, honestly the sensors aren't that great. It counted me taking steps over the course of the night hours when I was asleep, it also isn't as accurate with my sleep analysis. It still counted me for sleeping although I was already up for a good 30-40 minutes?? Like a few minutes is fine but that much time counted while awake is crazy. Also, so far the little button on the side (to turn it on and off), you can kinda roll it like a normal watch and what not, but so far, I haven't found it's purpose in being able to turn. It also doesn't register touch very well on the screen. Sometimes I have to press more than once for my music to come on and what not. I HAVE tried calling and it works pretty well so that's good. I've walked outside and it's pretty bright, and I can see, it also has a pretty good battery thus far, it's been over 10 hours after the first charge and it's going well. But keep in mind it's because I was sleeping. But anyways, the band strap is pretty good quality so my wrist isn't being destroyed which is good. Pretty easy set up with the app and what not, BUT, the app and the syncing is kinda slow. I had to update it 4 times for it to properly load my sleep analysis.Will update once I have used it longer.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 21, 2024

content.product_name: Smart Watch for Men Women (Answer/Make Call), 1.96"HD Smartwatch with Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor/Pedometer/Calories, 113+ Sports Fitness Tracker Watch, IP68 Waterproof Activity Tracker for Android iOS

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love It!
reviews.author: Cogline
reviews.content: I don't think there is a smartwatch this good for the price anywhere. I wanted one that constantly monitors my heart rate. None of my previous ones did this. I don't mind that it doesn't measure blood pressure as my bp is always good. It can measure blood oxygen as often as you like automatically. I also wanted one that could make/receive calls. Just sync with your contacts. Make sure to allow all permissions for it on your phone. And sleep monitoring is a must for me. It displays the current local temperature, something my last one didn't do properly. It has Many exercises to choose from. Many watch faces too, though I like the default face. You can make a custom background pic if you want, but it will only display pulse, time, date, and day. It is easy to sync and set up if you know basic phone settings. The band color is a quite unique light purple. It got here in 1 day in an Amazon box. I got a similar one for my daughter
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 12, 2024
